backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining chat threads, messages, user profiles, access entitlements, and authorization checks with stateful maps and helper guards.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report listing feature changes, involved files, components, tests, and confidence levels for recent frontend optimizations.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend React files including hooks, components, and styles.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions implementing app-wide color tokens, dark mode, and global styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app logic handling authentication, profile setup, access checks, and conditional rendering of chat or access screens.
frontend/src/components/access/PendingAc: UI screen for users without chat access that handles requesting or refreshing entitlement status and shows state‑specific messaging.
frontend/src/components/admin/AccessMana: Admin dialog for granting, revoking, and approving access entitlements with user selection and status display.
frontend/src/components/auth/Authenticat: Full‑screen loading view shown while authenticated user data is loading.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity authentication and query cache clearing.
Main chat layout managing thread list, thread view, user search, and access‑management dialog.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatThreadV: Displays a chat thread, loads messages, handles blocking, deleting, and auto‑scrolling.
frontend/src/components/chat/MessageComp: Input form for composing and sending messages with error handling.
frontend/src/components/chat/MessageItem: Renders a single message with editing, deletion, and sender details.
Lists user threads and triggers thread selection with basic display info.
frontend/src/components/chat/UserSearchS: Searches for users and creates a new chat thread, showing results and handling loading states.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Dialog for entering and submitting a display name during initial user setup.
frontend/src/components/profile/UserBadg: Displays the current user's avatar, display name, and shortened principal.
frontend/src/hooks/useAccessControl.ts: React-query hooks for admin access checks, retrieving and modifying access entitlements, and mapping entitlement status.
Hooks to check and request access permissions, refresh access-related state, and derive UI access state.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on identity, refetching dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBlocking.ts: Hooks to check block status, list blocked users, and perform block/unblock mutations with cache updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Hooks for fetching, saving, and registering the current user's profile, plus retrieving the current principal.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useMessages.ts: Defines React Query mutations for sending, editing, and deleting messages, with access checks and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useThreads.ts: Provides hooks to fetch, create, and delete chat threads and messages using React Query with identity and access checks.
frontend/src/hooks/useUsers.ts: Implements user listing, searching, and profile retrieval by aggregating entitlements and querying user profiles from the backend.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes, including layout and safe-area adjustments.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React, wraps the app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider, and loads global styles.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using URLSearchParams and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s current state, including scope, architectural notes, known issues, and existing features for the PriveChat app. Defines admin-authorization rules, branding changes, chat behavior requirements, and deployment details.
